The '''Salutary Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-Star [[Weapon Series]].

All weapons in this series can be [[Forging|forged]]. Forging these weapons notably require {{Item|Borderland Billet Trove|link=Borderland Billet|text=Borderland Billets|30}} and {{Item|Condessence Crystal|text=Condessence Crystals|30}}, among other materials. The diagrams for all weapons in this series are sold by [[Alom]] at [[The Salutary Furnace]].

==Trivia==
* The weapons in this series reference members of [[Xbalanque]] and [[Och-Kan]]'s travel group:
** Chain Breaker was wielded by [[Lianca]].
** Earth Shaker was wielded by [[Yupanqui]].
** Footprint of the Rainbow was wielded by [[Uenuku]].
** Ring of Yaxche tells the story of [[Ixquieh]] and [[Ahpub]].
** Flute of Ezpitzal was wielded by [[Maghan]].
